statusDetails.trace:
self = <test_login.LoginTests testMethod=test_successful_login>

    @allure.feature("Login Feature")
    @allure.story("Başarılı Giriş")
    def test_successful_login(self):
        """Başarılı giriş testi"""
        driver = self.driver
        driver.get("https://www.beymen.com/tr/customer/login?returnUrl=/tr/customer")
    
        try:
            # Çerez onayı varsa, kabul et
            try:
                accept_button = WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
                    EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "onetrust-accept-btn-handler"))
                )
                accept_button.click()
            except:
                pass  # Eğer çerez onayı yoksa, hata vermez.
    
            # Kullanıcı adı ve şifre gir
            with allure.step("Kullanıcı bilgilerini gir ve giriş yap"):
                WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
                    EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "customerEmail"))
                ).send_keys("busezmz@outlook.com")
    
                driver.find_element(By.ID, "password").send_keys("Barbie123")
    
                # Giriş butonuna tıkla
                login_button = driver.find_element(By.ID, "loginBtn")
                driver.execute_script("arguments[0].scrollIntoView();", login_button)
                WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
                    EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.ID, "loginBtn"))
                ).click()
    
            # Doğrulama: Sayfanın yüklenmesini bekle
            with allure.step("Hoş Geldiniz mesajını doğrula"):
                WebDriverWait(driver, 20).until(
                    EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "welcomeMessage"))
                )
                welcome_message = driver.find_element(By.ID, "welcomeMessage").text
                self.assertIn("Hoş Geldiniz", welcome_message, "Giriş başarısız!")
    
        except Exception as e:
            allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="test_successful_login", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
>           raise e

self = <selenium.webdriver.support.wait.WebDriverWait (session="157fc48562ac7864b8a25eedc3e608de")>
method = <function presence_of_element_located.<locals>._predicate at 0x000001FFFB67A660>, message = ''

    def until(self, method: Callable[[D], Union[Literal[False], T]], message: str = "") -> T:
        """Calls the method provided with the driver as an argument until the \
        return value does not evaluate to ``False``.
    
        :param method: callable(WebDriver)
        :param message: optional message for :exc:`TimeoutException`
        :returns: the result of the last call to `method`
        :raises: :exc:`selenium.common.exceptions.TimeoutException` if timeout occurs
        """
        screen = None
        stacktrace = None
    
        end_time = time.monotonic() + self._timeout
        while True:
            try:
                value = method(self._driver)
                if value:
                    return value
            except self._ignored_exceptions as exc:
                screen = getattr(exc, "screen", None)
                stacktrace = getattr(exc, "stacktrace", None)
            if time.monotonic() > end_time:
                break
            time.sleep(self._poll)
>       raise TimeoutException(message, screen, stacktrace)
